author: Indiesoft LLC
description: Unofficial Sentry.io SDK for Defold to monitor and track Lua code errors.
name: Sentinel

releases.message:
In this release, sending the user's system version from the ‘sys_info.system_version’ field has been temporarily disabled, as it contains an invalid string.

This change is temporary until the cause has been identified.
Added LuaDoc comments for all functions.
This release is compatible with Defold 1.8.0 and newer.

## What's Changed
* Fix #6 when it was impossible to disable some default options.

## What's Changed
* PR: tags to string by @SalavatR in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-sentinel/pull/5
* Removed rxi's json to use built-in `json.encode` (Defold 1.4.0 is required).
* Updated docs, added lots of code comments.

## New Contributors
* @SalavatR made their first contribution in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-sentinel/pull/5
